newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HomeCare sees Q3 write-off, reserve.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HomeCare sees Q3 write-off, reserve.

text.p: U.S. HomeCare Corp said on Monday it expected its fiscal third-quarter results to include a substantial write-off of intangible and other assets related to its former I.V. business and a restructuring reserve.
The company did not say how much it expected to write off or when it might report its quarterly earnings.
But U.S. HomeCare said G. Robert O'Brien, president and chief executive, and Stephen Matheson, chief administrative officer, have relinquished their day-to-day involvement with the company.
